sub_title: Product Owner, Manufacturing and Equipment Engineer
summary: The qualities which put me in front of other team members are my wisdom and conscientiousness. My positive attitude and vision has always helped me to learn and to adopt newer techniques during my entire professional career. The instinct and ability to stir teams has set the bar of my confidence yet higher; hence, the deep insight in Information technology and rock-solid exercises in Management disciplines and six sigma keeps motivating me to set for even further challenges.

certifications.name: Certificate in Advance MS Excel Management
Certificate in Network Architecture and Configuration

courses.name: Project Management: The Basics for Success
Supply Chain Management: A Learning Perspective

profile_positions.description:
•	Leads team that supports product delivery teams, aligning with Project Leads on needs and milestones.  Distributes resources to balance program needs
•	Supports a multi-disciplinary and cross-functional team in the design, qualification and development of modules to assure performance, operation, serviceability, and cost-of-ownership requirements.
•	Provides design and procedure support in a continuous product improvement effort leveraging feedback from customers, personal experience, and other field integration engineers.
•	Leads critical escalations. Provides status and path forward directly to the customer and field engineers; works with Product Marketing, NPI, D&E and GSC.
•	Maintains reporting for escalation and project work, brings any issues or discoveries to leadership team. Ensures learnings are captured in development efforts. 
•	Works with Function Architects, Project Leads and other Product Owners to define testing alignment and planning, and determine resourcing.
•	Supports equipment design, performance validation and product documentation activities.
•	Participates in system level design reviews and provides feedback to ensure adherence to safety, process controls, and quality principles.
•	Perform SAFe (Scaled Agile Framework) role of product owner
profile_positions.title: Product Owner

profile_positions.description:
•	Representing the customer support sector in the co-design phase.
•	Implementing service requirements in the product design.
•	Introduction of new product design towards field organization.
•	Providing feedback on structural improvements towards development team.
•	Reviewing technical documentation to determine the Industrialization impact.
•	Defining documentation, spare parts and tooling for the global service organization.
•	Analyzing complex problems on-site.
•	Transfer of knowledge from development to local service organizations.
•	Analyzing products performance and defining requirements for co-design improvement.
profile_positions.title: Manufacturing and Equipment Engineer

profile_positions.description:
(additional ASML role to ME/EE)
•	•	Ensuring good quality of FCO deliveries from its Functional Cluster (FC).
•	Training the FC community (SW Dev/EE/ME) on writing good quality FCOs.
•	To act as a FC CCB and review all CONCEPT FCOs according to the criteria.
•	Deploying the changes/improvements in FCO process/WoW within FC community. 
•	To drive issue analysis process w.r.t FCO patch hits within FC.
•	To align with FCO-Core team and to continuously improve FCO WoW. 
•	Contribute to criteria improvements and update the community on the deviations. 
•	Contribute to the knowledge base (use cases, FAQs and training material).
profile_positions.title: Software Field Change Order Key-user

profile_positions.description:
(additional ASML role to ME/EE)
•	Ensuring timely delivery by the scrum team.
•	Leading, building and facilitating the scrum team to become high performing.
•	Creating transparency and alignment on scrum team speed, quality of deliverables.
•	Signaling and removing of impediments.
•	Following the technical way of working and ensuring high quality delivery by the team.
•	To ensure that the dependencies and risks are managed by the team.
•	Supplier management and outsourcing execution.
•	Providing analyses of current team rituals and drive for improvements in team rituals.
profile_positions.title: Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
•	Product prototype design collaboration with Taiwanese HQ.
•	Product testing (OOBE), interface and usability Testing.
•	Flagging improvements on product quality and usability during the product life cycle.
•	Product compatibility tests with OS network controllers and GPUs.
•	Embedded graphics and hardware design evaluations.
•	Onsite Tier/Level 2 and 3 Supports.
•	LCD, DLP and Laser Beamer tech support across Europe and Russia.
profile_positions.title: Field Application Engineer / Product Trainer

profile_positions.description:
•	Managing ASP repair teams and repair services.
•	Product support to Nordic region (Finland, Denmark, Norway and Sweden),
•	Tier/Level 2 and 3 service and escalation support for consumer electronics manufacturers. 
•	Being a spider in the net among manufacturers, repair, support and logistics departments.
•	Maintaining KPIs, analyzing bottlenecks in process and repair chains.
•	Spare parts shortage analysis, supporting refurbishment and exchange of products.
•	Team performance and appraisal reporting.
•	Maintaining billing process, and cost reduction analysis.
profile_positions.title: Arbetsledare (Team Leader)
